message.body: I wrote a story set at grippin lake that is coming out in a lit magazine in the spring. If you want it, my second contributor copy goes to you.

That is very kind of you, part of me really would like it but part of me feels like it would be too hard. Both because the Canadian government shut the camp down and because of memories of being with you there.
I'm sorry, can I think about it?
Sure! It doesn't come out until April anyway. I'm sorry to hear the camp was shut down. If it helps, the characters and plot are not based on real life. Just the setting. I don't mean to overstep.
I know you have only good intentions.
